You Are Here : Home / Government

Government

City Government

Discover the heart of Arlington's local government at City Hall, including meetings, elected officials, and the City Secretary's Office.

Meetings & Agendas

Information on upcoming meetings, agendas, and past meeting minutes.

Departments

An overview of the city's various departments, contact details and services offered.

Elections & Voting

Learn about upcoming elections, voter registration, and essential election resources, including Council District maps.

Public Safety

Explore safety resources, tips, and emergency preparedness to help ensure a thriving and secure city for all.

Municipal Court

Easy access to information on court hours, location, payment options, citations, warrants, and other court related matters.

Budget & Finance

Stay informed on how your tax dollars are being invested to improve the local economy, public safety, and quality of life.

Records

Access City of Arlington's records options.

Jobs & Volunteering

Whether you're looking to start a career or give back to the community, there are various ways to get involved and make a difference.

Contact Us

Find important contact information for City of Arlington departments, including emergency services, housing, public works, code compliance, and more.

Data & Information

Explore the City of Arlingtons commitment to transparency with easy access to financial reports, artificial intelligence policies, legislative documents, and more!
